title: Tech Firm Says Kamala Harris Debate Earring Similar To Its Bluetooth Device
content: The fierce presidential debate between US Vice President Kamala Harris, and former President Donald Trump took social media by storm, generating responses of all kinds ranging from netizens to Taylor Swift and Elon Musk.
summary: The fierce presidential debate between US Vice President Kamala Harris, and former President Donald Trump took social media by storm, generating responses of all kinds ranging from netizens to Taylor Swift and Elon Musk.

title: Chief Of Israel's Elite Intelligence Group 'Unit 8200' Quits. Here's Why
content: The Israeli army said on Thursday that the head of an elite intelligence unit will resign over the failure to prevent Hamas's October 7 attack.
summary: The Israeli army said on Thursday that the head of an elite intelligence unit will resign over the failure to prevent Hamas's October 7 attack.

title: Elon Musk's Daughter Calls Him "Heinous Incel" Over Post For Taylor Swift
content: Elon Musk's estranged daughter Vivian Wilson, who came out as transgender in 2022, has attacked her father over his controversial post on X offering to give Taylor Swift a child after she endorsed Democratic nominee Kamala Harris for president.
summary: Elon Musk's estranged daughter Vivian Wilson, who came out as transgender in 2022, has attacked her father over his controversial post on X offering to give Taylor Swift a child after she endorsed Democratic nominee Kamala Harris for president.

title: Elon Musk Calls Australian Government 'Fascists' Over New Misinformation Law
content: Elon Musk, owner of social media platform X, on Friday called Australia's centre-left government "fascists" over proposed legislation to slap fines on social media firms for failing to prevent the spread of misinformation online.
summary: Elon Musk, owner of social media platform X, on Friday called Australia's centre-left government "fascists" over proposed legislation to slap fines on social media firms for failing to prevent the spread of misinformation online.

title: Alaska Airlines Plane Aborts Takeoff To Avoid Collision With Southwest Jet
content: An Alaska Airlines airplane aborted takeoff on a runway at Nashville International Airport on Thursday to avoid a potential collision with a Southwest Airlines jet, the airline said.
summary: An Alaska Airlines airplane aborted takeoff on a runway at Nashville International Airport on Thursday to avoid a potential collision with a Southwest Airlines jet, the airline said.

title: Trump Promises To Eliminate Taxes On Overtime Pay If Elected
content: Republican U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Thursday that he will end all taxes on overtime pay as part of a wider tax cut package, if he is elected in the Nov. 5 election.
summary: Republican U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Thursday that he will end all taxes on overtime pay as part of a wider tax cut package, if he is elected in the Nov. 5 election.

title: Bomb Threat Rattles US City In Republican Anti-Migrant Conspiracy
content: Government buildings and an elementary school in Springfield, Ohio were evacuated Thursday after an emailed bomb threat, police said, rattling the small US city at the heart of an anti-migrant conspiracy theory amplified by Donald Trump.
summary: Government buildings and an elementary school in Springfield, Ohio were evacuated Thursday after an emailed bomb threat, police said, rattling the small US city at the heart of an anti-migrant conspiracy theory amplified by Donald Trump.

title: North Korea Publicly Discloses Uranium Enrichment Facility For 1st Time
content: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un has called for increasing the number of centrifuges for uranium enrichment in order to increase its nuclear weapons for self-defence, the state media said on Friday.
summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un has called for increasing the number of centrifuges for uranium enrichment in order to increase its nuclear weapons for self-defence, the state media said on Friday.

title: "Filth": White House Slams Trump's Pet-Eating Slur Against Migrants
content: The White House on Thursday condemned debunked stories being pushed by Donald Trump about Haitian migrants eating pet cats and dogs in Ohio as "filth" and said they were endangering people's lives.
summary: The White House on Thursday condemned debunked stories being pushed by Donald Trump about Haitian migrants eating pet cats and dogs in Ohio as "filth" and said they were endangering people's lives.

title: US Court Dismisses Two Criminal Counts Against Trump
content: A Georgia judge on Thursday dismissed two criminal counts in the U.S. state's 2020 election interference case against Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and one other count against allies of the former president.
summary: A Georgia judge on Thursday dismissed two criminal counts in the U.S. state's 2020 election interference case against Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and one other count against allies of the former president.

title: Trump Says He Will Not Participate In Another Debate With Kamala Harris
content: Former President Donald Trump on Thursday said he would not participate in another election debate against his rival Vice President Kamala Harris.
summary: Former President Donald Trump on Thursday said he would not participate in another election debate against his rival Vice President Kamala Harris.

title: Quarter Of Those Wounded In Gaza Have "Life-Changing Injuries": WHO
content: The World Health Organization said Thursday that at least a quarter of those hurt in the war raging in Gaza have suffered "life-changing injuries", many requiring amputations and other "huge" rehabilitation needs.
summary: The World Health Organization said Thursday that at least a quarter of those hurt in the war raging in Gaza have suffered "life-changing injuries", many requiring amputations and other "huge" rehabilitation needs.

title: SpaceX Polaris Dawn Crew Makes History With First-Ever Private Spacewalk
content: A pioneering private crew made history Thursday by performing the first commercial spacewalk, with NASA hailing it as "a giant leap forward" for the space industry.
summary: A pioneering private crew made history Thursday by performing the first commercial spacewalk, with NASA hailing it as "a giant leap forward" for the space industry.

title: Israel To Revoke Press Cards Of Al Jazeera Journalists Working In The Nation
content: Israel announced on Thursday it was revoking the press credentials of Al Jazeera journalists working in the country, four months after shutting down the Qatari television network.
summary: Israel announced on Thursday it was revoking the press credentials of Al Jazeera journalists working in the country, four months after shutting down the Qatari television network.

title: All About 'Storm Shadow' Missiles That Ukraine May Use To Strike Russia
content: Ukraine plans to change its war strategy with the use of long-range cruise missiles targeting deep inside Russian territory. Kyiv's use of missiles has so far been within its own territory where the Russian military has invaded.
summary: Ukraine plans to change its war strategy with the use of long-range cruise missiles targeting deep inside Russian territory. Kyiv's use of missiles has so far been within its own territory where the Russian military has invaded.

title: Watch: S Jaishankar's G7 Googly When Questioned In Europe About BRICS
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, when asked about the need for BRICS while a grouping like G20 already existed, responded that if the G7 can exist when there is the G20, there is no reason why BRICS cannot.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, when asked about the need for BRICS while a grouping like G20 already existed, responded that if the G7 can exist when there is the G20, there is no reason why BRICS cannot.

title: "For Greater Good...": New York Police Chief Resigns Amid Corruption Probe
content: New York's top cop, head of the largest police department in the United States, resigned Thursday amid corruption probes swirling through the city's leadership.
summary: New York's top cop, head of the largest police department in the United States, resigned Thursday amid corruption probes swirling through the city's leadership.

title: US Man Buys ₹3 Crore Cliffside Home Despite Risk Of Falling Into Ocean
content: Moot, who believes "Life's too short" to miss out on such opportunities, purchased the house at 67% less than its 2022 asking price of $1.195 million.
summary: Moot, who believes "Life's too short" to miss out on such opportunities, purchased the house at 67% less than its 2022 asking price of $1.195 million.

title: Putin Warns NATO, US On Ukraine Using Long-Range Weapons To Strike Russia
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that the West letting Kyiv use longer-range weapons to strike Russian targets would mean NATO would be "at war" with Russia.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that the West letting Kyiv use longer-range weapons to strike Russian targets would mean NATO would be "at war" with Russia.

title: Harris Leads Over Trump, Voters See Her As Debate Winner In Latest Polls
content: Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris leads Republican Donald Trump 47% to 42% in the race to win the Nov. 5 presidential election, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll that closed on Thursday.
summary: Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris leads Republican Donald Trump 47% to 42% in the race to win the Nov. 5 presidential election, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll that closed on Thursday.
